description:
Built by Dr. Hell based on Professor Kabuto`s original blueprints for a robot intended [spoiler]Built by Dr. Hell based on Professor Kabuto`s original blueprints for a robot intended as partner for Mazinger-Z.
Due to Dr. Hells lack of technology it`s been built without Japanium and photonic energy source (as used in Mazinger-Z).
Its attack repertoire includes Rocket Punch, Rust Hurricane and Breast Fire and Koushiryoku Beam.
name: Minerva X
